actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To provide for the establishment of a Commission on the Advancement of Social Enterprise.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Social Enterprise Ecosystem and Economic Development Commission Act of 2012 or the SEEED Commission Act of 2012 - Establishes the Commission on the Advancement of Social Enterprise to examine and make recommendations on ways the federal government can support and utilize social enterprises. Requires the Commission to: (1) establish criteria for identifying social enterprises for purposes of federal programs, and (2) identify opportunities for the federal government to engage social enterprises in creating jobs and strengthening local economies.

titles.title: Social Enterprise Ecosystem and Economic Development Commission Act of 2012
To provide for the establishment of a Commission on the Advancement of Social Enterprise.
